title: Searching / Neue Haas Grotesk Specimen Circa.1968
content:
I am looking for a specimen of the Typeface Neue Haas-Grotesk/Helvetica circa 1968 designed by Hans Neuburg and Nelly Rudin. I need to have high resolution scans of the medium/halbfett cut to pursue a personal project on the original Helvetica. thank you in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020233131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/helvetica_1968_specimen_3636.jpg)
author: Alexis Hominal

comments.content: Any particular point size you seek?
If possible the page 33: point size 20/24/28, page 37: point size 60/72 and the full alphabet page 40+41
